TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit TtsEngineSsml extends System.Object

summary.span: 所有的语音合成引擎文字可实现的抽象基类。

span.span: Abstract base class to be implemented by all text to speech synthesis engines.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要将自定义文本构造到语音引擎，应用程序必须始终实现从抽象基类 派生的类。To construct a custom text to speech engine, an application must always implement a class derived from the abstract base class . 然后，可以通过 基于命名空间的应用程序，将 的正确注册的实现用作合成器声音。A properly registered implementation of can then be used as a synthesizer voice by name space based applications. 继承自 的对象必须重写以下成员： 、、、 和 。Objects inheriting from must override the following members: , , , and . 要实现的 类中最重要的成员是 方法。The most important member of the class to be implemented is the method. 方法由基础结构文本分析器接收：The method is called by the infrastructures text parser receiving: 1. 对 接口的引用，该接口提供对诸如甚至排队和写入音频输出等系统服务的访问。A reference to the interface, which provides access to system services such as even queuing and writing audio output. 2. 从语音合成标记语言（SSML）输入生成的 实例的数组。An array of instance produced from Speech Synthesis Markup Language (SSML) input. 除了呈现为语音的文本外，SSML 分析还会在与每个传入 对象关联的 实例中存储有关语音请求的属性的信息。In addition to text to be rendered as speech, the parsing of the SSML stores information about the requested attributes of the speech in a instance associated with each incoming object. 当某个语音合成器应用程序尝试提供正确的音频输出时，可以根据需要通过实现要调用的 来为其发出指定的输出格式。A speech synthesizer application can optionally make requests for a specified output format by implementing to be called by the platform when it tries to provide the correct audio output. 实施者还可以通过其 和 的实现，为发音或词典管理外部定义提供支持。An implementer can also provide support for managing external definitions of pronunciations, or lexicons, by their implementation of and .

Protected Sub New (registryKey As String)

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

param.name: registryKey
param.span: 与 实现相关的语音标记的注册表项的全名。

span.span: Full name of the registry key for the Voice Token associated with the implementation.
engine.

summary.span: 基于相应的语音标记注册表项构建新的 实例。

span.span: Constructs a new instance of based on an appropriate Voice Token registry key.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对此构造函数的调用通常由基于 的应用程序生成，这些应用程序选择要由 的实例使用的合成器声音。Calls to this constructor are typically generated by based applications selecting a synthesizer voice to be used by an instance of . 必须在 HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE \SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Speech\Voices\Tokens. 下注册A must be register under HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Speech\Voices\Tokens.

MemberSignature.Value: public abstract void AddLexicon (Uri uri, string mediaType, System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite site);

Public MustOverride Sub AddLexicon (uri As Uri, mediaType As String, site As ITtsEngineSite)

abstract member AddLexicon : Uri * string * System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite -> unit

param.name: uri
param.span: 指示词典信息位置的 的有效实例。

span.span: A valid instance of indicating the location of the lexicon information.

param.name: mediaType
param.span: 一个包含该词典的媒体类型的字符串。

span.span: A string containing the media type of the lexicon.

param.span: 媒体类型要区分大小写。

span.span: Media types are case insensitive.

param.name: site
param.span: 对用于与平台基础结构进行交互的 接口的引。

span.span: A reference to an interface used to interact with the platform infrastructure.

summary.span: 添加词典到当前 实例实现的 。

span.span: Adds a lexicon to the implemented by the current instance.

para.span: 实现需要完全熟悉，并能够处理 上存储的字典。

span.span: It is the responsibility of the implementation to be fully familiar with and be able to process the lexicon stored at .

para.span: 实现还必须跟踪和管理它所添加的所有字典的生存期。

span.span: The implementation must also keep track and manage the lifetimes of all lexicons it adds.

param.name: speakOutputFormat
param.span: 指示请求的音频输出格式的类型 枚举的有效成员。

param.name: targetWaveFormat
param.span: 指向音频格式类型中包含由 参数请求的详细信息设置的 的指针。

span.span: A pointer to a containing detail setting for the audio format type requested by the argument.

summary.span: 返回对向合成器引擎请求支持特定输出格式的给定合成引擎响应支持的最佳匹配音频输出。

span.span: Returns the best matching audio output supported by a given synthesize engine response to a request to the synthesizer engine for the support of a particular output format.

returns.span: 返回引用包含有关输出格式的详细信息 的有效 实例。

span.span: Returns a valid instance referring to a containing detailed information about the output format.

para.span: 继承自 的对象应检查 指定的请求的输出格式，并返回它支持的最接近格式。

span.span: Object inheriting from should examine the requested output format as specified by and return the closest format that it supports.

summary.span: 在指定的输出格式呈现指定的 数组。

span.span: Renders specified array in the specified output format.

para.span: 自定义语音合成器使用 和 在 命名空间和基础系统语音合成引擎的成员使用平台基础结构构造的合成器应用程序之间实现筛选器或中介。

span.span: Custom speech synthesizer implements using and work as filters or intermediaries between synthesizer applications constructed using the platform infrastructure through the members of the namespace and underlying system speech synthesis engines.
A implementation:

para.span: 捕获或修改传入 对象的各个方面

span.span: Traps or modify aspects of the incoming objects

para.span: 使用对 实例的站点引用生成任何必需事件

span.span: Generates any necessary events using the site reference to a instance
Generates the actual synthesized speech.

para.span: 通常，生成语音是通过在操作系统提供的一种语音呈现引擎上调用讲话来完成的。

span.span: Generation of speech is most typically done by calling Speak on one of the speech rendering engines provided by the operating system.

para.span: 如果未使用某个可用的语音呈现引擎，则从 继承的对象必须创建其自己的语音呈现引擎。

span.span: If one of the available speech rendering engines is not used, a object inheriting from must create its own speech rendering engine.

para.span: 使用注册表和反射获得的对讲话方法的访问。

span.span: Access to the Speak method on obtained using the registry and reflection.

para.span: 当从 继承时，必须重写以下成员： ""、""、""、"" 和 ""。

span.span: When you inherit from , you must override the following members: , , , , and .
